error_details.explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'onion_ratio_denominator' (1) was used instead of 'cheese_ratio_numerator' (2).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 23
Cheese pizzas are 1/2 of the pizza's purchased because 1 / (1+1) = 1/2
She buys 3 cheese pizzas because 6 x (1/2) = <<6*1/2=3>>3
These give her 54 pieces of cheese pizza because 3 x 18 = <<3*18=54>>54
The students at 46 pieces of cheese because 54 - 8 = <<54-8=46>>46
There are 23 students in her class because 46 / 2 = <<46/2=23>>23
